Author: BitDane
Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: Hi Rapha-EL,  Actually, Fair Ninja was originally designed to create a truly international marketplace for second-hand goods but because not all people are fond of buying secondhand products and want to buy brand new products, they are planning to develop partnerships with online retailers as they grow their user base.  Please see below excerpts from Fair Ninja Whitepaper for reference:  Page 10 Quote All of the benefits of and challenges to online classified platforms discussed above highlight the opportunity to use blockchain technology to create a truly international marketplace for secondhand goods.  Page 22 Quote Although we are starting with a focus on second-hand goods, we expect our community to eventually want to buy brand new products as well. Although our initial concept is to connect classified platforms from all over the world, we also would like to develop partnerships with online retailers as we grow our user base. The option to buy both brand new and second-hand goods using cryptocurrencies is appealing to both sellers and buyers, and we expect to develop these relationships in the near future.  I also got this on the first page of this ANN Thread that obviously shows that they are into second-hand goods.

Author: smith4cris
Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: I don't think this will be the case. As I understand it, Seller has his price on the item for sale, this may or may not include shipping fees some offer it with free shipping. If a buyer is willing to buy he will click the portion buy and a standard smart contract will be provided then the amount that the buyer needs to pay plus any charges to be included will be billed to buyer. Buyer will now click the payment options and pay using his crypto wallet address. This will be deposited to Fair Ninja for safe keeping at the moment until the buyer receives the item in good condition. Once item is received without any complains or the item is not returned within the period stipulated in the smart contract, Seller will receive the Payment in Full. The concept is similar to escrow payment in Real Estate, where the payment is put in a bank in escrow until both parties fulfilled their obligation.  Concern in the said transaction in case item is returned. I believe this will depend on what is agreed upon or what will be the standard set up by Fair Ninja.

Author: daimar48
Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: Quote from: BitcoinPanther on May 15, 2018, 09:43:50 AM "Trust is earned when actions meet words ...." Chris Butler.  And it is indeed good to find this post by Fair Ninja's Founder and CEO, Zeljko Hudoletnjak, giving a short introduction of who he is which i'd say is a very trustworthy intro;  Quote Let me give you a little background on me. I am currently the CEO of Oglasnik - one of the largest classifieds companies in Croatia.  Our yearly revenue is around $3M. I have been the CEO of Oglasnik for 3 years and, in that time, I have managed to turn the company around from a D2 score to an A+. All in under 3 years! This is one of my greatest achievements to date.  I would like to highlight that no money was put into the company to resolve its debt, and none of the creditors wrote off any of it. It was all paid off in full. There were no loans nor credit, the business was strictly funded from our operations.  Due to this past experience, I know how to manage people and assets, even during stressful times. Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: Fair Ninja is the world‚Äôs first multi-national online classifieds platform that allows users to buy and sell goods and services from anywhere in the world to anyone in the world. Our goal is to connect the world‚Äôs individual classified marketplaces into a single market, making commerce easier than ever. Moreover, the Fair Ninja platform will be the first to offer fully integrated cryptocurrency payment options, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin, as well as our own ERC20-compliant Yoshi coin. Using smart contracts, Fair Ninja will offer transparent, reliable, secure, and anonymous transactions that will make online commerce internationally viable and completely frictionless.    Damn, this project is really the bomb. I was always wishing that something like this would really come to help people like me who want's to make businesses online with the use of the cryptos to have more advantage and more profits without risking my funds or even going through the hassle of looking for trusted escrows just to make sure that my funds are safe and that I make good business. Author: FairNinjaICO
Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: We will eventually be creating our own blockchain, in the meantime, with the ethereum platform all we will be writing down inside the contract will be the sum/ the amount that is being transferred, and the username to keep the transaction/the user safe. So no credit cards, bank wires etc. Keep in mind we don't want illegal activity on our platform as all the ads will be moderated so it wouldn't contain stuff being sold that's illegal, otherwise think of it as buying with cash but you have a platform keeping your transactions safe and you don't have to pay high platform/bank/wire or exchange fees.

Body: Hi:). There are multiple reasons. We have already working classifieds company behind us, Oglasnik. The safety comes from using smart contracts, both buyer and seller are protected, as seller cannot recieve payment if the item/product isn't delievered to buyer as in the condition they agreed on. Also, there will be rating system on user profiles to keep trust between sellers and buyers. Notice that the platform isn't just second hand goods, it is everything that people are buying and selling in usual classifieds, or online marketplaces.

Author: Wapinter
Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: WEBSITE | TELEGRAM | TWITTER   | FACEBOOK   | REDDIT  | TWITTER | BOUNTY   Fair Ninja is the world‚Äôs first multi-national online classifieds platform that allows users to buy and sell goods and services from anywhere in the world to anyone in the world. Our goal is to connect the world‚Äôs individual classified marketplaces into a single market, making commerce easier than ever. Moreover, the Fair Ninja platform will be the first to offer fully integrated cryptocurrency payment options, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin, as well as our own ERC20-compliant Yoshi coin. Using smart contracts, Fair Ninja will offer transparent, reliable, secure, and anonymous transactions that will make online commerce internationally viable and completely frictionless.  WHITEPAPER    ICO coming Q2 2018 Bounty and translation program info soon  Token name: Yoshi Token ticker: YSH Total supply: 500M YSH Available for token sale: 50% Soft cap: 5,000,000 USD Hard cap: 23,250,000 USD Token price pre-ICO: 0,08 USD Token price ICO: 0,1 USD  OUR PARTNERS    Feel free to ask any questions regarding the project and join our social media!

Author: FairNinjaICO
Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: Hello everyone and welcome to our ANN thread     Bounty program will be managed by user Wapinter . Bounty details coming tomorrow and yes,there will be translation bounties aswell!  Our project has high ambitions and we want to create a marketplace where people can finally find cryptocurrency spendable and usable. As we feel that we can simplify , make faster and make better the process of buying/selling goods and services between two people. Especially if you already own cryptocurrency,the process is long and complicated. Sell crypto to fiat->transfer to bank->calculate saving for taxes->buy. We sometimes forget that cryptocurrency is cryptoCURRENCY . We tapped into the world of cryptocurrency with idea to change the usual classifieds system by using the blockchain technology.  Our team isn't complete,and we will expand,that means also advisors needed to reach our goals. We are every aware of the potential of our project

Author: tippytoes
Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: I like this platform as I am also an online shopper. And maybe getting branded items at a much cheaper price because it's second-hand already. But what I'm wondering is the shipping fee. Sometimes the shipping fee incurs higher cost than the cost of the item itself. Even purchasing in ali express, alibaba, amazon, etc. has really high shipping fee that sometimes you will end up buying the goods locally. So what are your suggestions on this or you have the solution for this problem already?

Author: FairNinjaICO
Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: Hi, appreciate the interest, and that is a great question. We are in talks with some affiliate shipping partners similar to DHL and FEDEX who will offer flat rate shipping fees, and competitive prices for users who wish to ship via FairNinja. So we will deff. try to provide that service as a bonus.

Author: FairNinjaICO
Title: üí•‚≠ïÔ∏è[ANN] Fair Ninja - 1st Worldwide Classifieds Marketplace Using Blockchain‚≠ïÔ∏è
Body: Hello . Yes, network congestion is a problem. We have other payment options (litecoin, btc) and we will add more in the future, but as we want yoshies to be used the most, we will either make our own compatible blockchain in the future or use some other eth compatible to avoid slow transactions.
